name: Neon City
description: Neon City is an urban labyrinth with concrete walls scribbled with graffiti and towering skyscrapers which disappear into the smoky sky. Billboards flash with digital messages in various languages. The sound of incoming and outgoing traffic fills the air at all times, occasionally being overpowered by the boom of hovercrafts. The air is thick, almost tangible, filled with the scent of rain-soaked concrete, engine grease, cheerless cafes, and a hundred different types of citizens. It is home to both high-tech establishments and decrepit slums, a stark reminder of the disparity between those who benefit from the advanced technology and those who are left behind.

travel_descriptions.west: Leaving the heart of Neon City, you head towards the setting sun until the sleek skyscrapers give way to the cluttered skyline of the Cybernetic Slums. As you navigate through the relentless traffic, you can't help but notice how quickly the hi-tech intimidations replaced by a spirited, albeit disordered, monument of survival.
travel_descriptions.up: From the heart of Neon City, you take an elevator that shoots upwards at speeds that make your stomach flip. As the doors ding open, you are greeted by the sterile, crisp environment of the Sky-high Tower. There is an immediate change from the hustle outside, into a quiet, efficient workspace.

name: The Cybernetic Slums
description: This is a crumbled side of the Neon City, where people salvage technology and create makeshift cybernetics for their survival. Amidst ramshackle buildings, meandering wires form a complex network overhead, connecting disparate pieces of tech, some of which is quite advanced. It is a neighborhood filled with the hum of generators, the sputtering of old neon lights, and the determined spirit of those who refuse to be left behind.

travel_descriptions.east: From the heart of the Cybernetic Slums, you navigate the labyrinth of ramshackle buildings, back into Neon City. As you follow the rising sun, the meandering, wire-laced skyline gives way to towering skyscrapers and digital billboards, and the hum of barely-there generators is replaced by the constant melody of city traffic.

name: The Sky-high Tower
description: The tower is an imposing skyscraper that scrapes the smoky sky, the pinnacle of corporate power. Its gleaming glass and steel facade reflect the flashing digital messages of nearby billboards, while inside, it is a cold, mechanized environment filled with an efficient workforce and guarded secrets. With several underground layers dedicated to research and security, only a select few even know what lies beneath the offices that crowd its upper floors.

travel_descriptions.down: Leaving the echelons of power, you take the elevator down from the Sky-high Tower. As the doors open, you are greeted enthusiastically by the uproar of Neon City. Your senses are quickly overwhelmed by the sight, sound, and smell of a living, breathing metropolis.
